body_html:
Thanks @drpngx for the review. The current PR utilizes the existing implementation of io::RecordReaderwhich allows a compression type as the flag.

To add compression to the payload but expose the header might be possible. It may require additional implementations on io::RecordReader.

Let me play with it and see if I could create another PR for that.
body_text:
Thanks @drpngx for the review. The current PR utilizes the existing implementation of io::RecordReaderwhich allows a compression type as the flag.
To add compression to the payload but expose the header might be possible. It may require additional implementations on io::RecordReader.
Let me play with it and see if I could create another PR for that.
body:
Thanks @drpngx for the review. The current PR utilizes the existing implementation of `io::RecordReader`which allows a compression type as the flag.

To add compression to the payload but expose the header might be possible. It may require additional implementations on `io::RecordReader`.

Let me play with it and see if I could create another PR for that.
